BackstoryDef.title: Frontier citizen
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After escaping [PAWN_possessive] masters [PAWN_nameDef] took up refuge in a Android Enclave. While not remarkable [PAWN_pronoun] gained the skills needed to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: Social citizen
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After escaping [PAWN_possessive] masters [PAWN_nameDef] took up refuge in a Android Enclave. While not remarkable [PAWN_pronoun] gained the skills needed to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: Amateur miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took up mining as a hobby shortly after escaping [PAWN_possessive] previous masters. [PAWN_pronoun] made a small wealth from [PAWN_possessive] exploratory mine shafts.

BackstoryDef.title: Entertainer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became quite the entertainer after finding [PAWN_possessive] freedom. Either by words or sword [PAWN_pronoun] performed [PAWN_possessive] acts.

BackstoryDef.title: Doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Doctoring came natural to [PAWN_nameDef], sewing both human and androids wounds shut [PAWN_pronoun] took price in [PAWN_possessive] craft.

BackstoryDef.title: Artisan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Smithing and tailoring came natural to [PAWN_nameDef], soon enough words were spread of [PAWN_possessive] crafts across the planet.

BackstoryDef.title: War engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Finding an affinity to both construction and destruction [PAWN_nameDef] became quite good at both.

BackstoryDef.title: Hippie
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is vividly fascinated by the world of plants. [PAWN_pronoun] took up the hobby in Plants smokeleaf after escaping [PAWN_possessive] masters and finding a abandoned hydroponics setup.

BackstoryDef.title: Chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] love to find new ways to prepare dishes. In [PAWN_possessive] enclave, they made quite the name of themselves after they made peace with a neighbouring tribe of tribals after serving the leader a divinely tasting dish in the peace meetings.

BackstoryDef.title: Genius
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a genius in most ways, [PAWN_pronoun] can invent new ways to make lightbulbs in a snap but [PAWN_pronoun] can't hold a conversation without making a fool of themselves.

BackstoryDef.title: Sharpshooter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] can see a hare from a mile away and track and hunt it. But they fumble when anything gets up close to them.

BackstoryDef.title: Brawler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] love to get up and close when fighting, but [PAWN_pronoun] can't hit a dart and using a mallet in crocket [PAWN_pronoun] is more likely to hit themselves with the ball than [PAWN_possessive] target.

BackstoryDef.title: Protector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took up the task to protect [PAWN_possessive] enclave by both steel and fire. [PAWN_pronoun] do it by great ferocity has vowed to keep [PAWN_possessive] enclave standing.

BackstoryDef.title: Petshop owner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] opened up a petshop a short while after gaining freedom. [PAWN_pronoun] cleaned their pens and sold them to prospecting pet owners.

BackstoryDef.title: Miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] operated deep drills in outposts to gather steel. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to fend off raiders time to time but [PAWN_pronoun] was content with [PAWN_possessive] lot in life.

BackstoryDef.title: Broken android
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s drop pod malfunctioned shortly after entering the atmosphere and caused it veer out of control. After barely surviving the crash [PAWN_pronoun] was permanently hindered for life.

BackstoryDef.title: Sculptor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s took great interest in the arts shortly after settling in [PAWN_possessive] enclave. Sculpted both blocks and great works of art alike!

BackstoryDef.title: Abandoned
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned and disposed after [PAWN_possessive] previous master failed to fully control HIM. [PAWN_pronoun] found themselves shortly in the enclave of a rimworld after a crafty fellow Android reactivated them.

BackstoryDef.title: Janitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of small army of janitors aboard a spaceship. [PAWN_pronoun] was accidentally disposed of while [PAWN_pronoun] was cleaning a drop pod. [PAWN_pronoun] was lucky to find a enclave on the world [PAWN_pronoun] dropped on.

BackstoryDef.title: Fighter pilot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] flew high speed fighters in the void of space. After a failed mission which caused [PAWN_possessive] ship to crash down into a rimworld [PAWN_pronoun] found great use of [PAWN_possessive] skills there.

BackstoryDef.title: Firefighter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was adept at fighting fires and cleaning up the aftermath. [PAWN_pronoun] became quite good at tending burn wounds as well.

BackstoryDef.title: Drifter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never stayed in one place for too long. As a result [PAWN_pronoun] never truly formed any long lasting relationships.

BackstoryDef.title: Undercover spy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a spy deep undercover in a enemy faction base. To ensure the enemy could not get [PAWN_pronoun] to talk if captured, the beaurau installed a Black Box inside [PAWN_possessive] body. They found freedom from their mission after they lost contact with the beaurau permanently.

BackstoryDef.title: Courtesan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] escaped their masters very late in their lifetime. [PAWN_nameDef] is heavily modified to suit their previous masters needs, some of which come in handy on the rim. [PAWN_pronoun] took refuge in a enclave which gladly took them in after nearly no persuasion.
